channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The world has too much oil right now. Will companies want Venezuela's?
item.description: Crude prices are low. Companies are being cautious. But huge reserves — particularly of the heavy, viscous oil Venezuela has in abundance — remain app...

item.title: The delightful history behind serendipity suggests it's not mere luck
item.description: While serendipity has often been associated with luck or happy accidents, its origin suggests that it goes beyond just happenstance.

item.title: After the LA fires, false narratives on social media impacted state policy
item.description: Misinformation spread quickly after the wildfires in Los Angeles last year. Some of these false narratives on social media impacted California policy.

item.title: Opposition leader Machado says her coalition should lead Venezuela
item.description: President Trump has publicly dismissed the Nobel winner Machado saying she doesn't have local support and respect.

item.title: 1/6: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Marking five years since the Jan. 6 Capitol attack; House set to consider extension for expired ACA subsidies.

item.title: Russia sends navy to guard oil tanker being pursued by US forces
item.description: US officials say that American forces plan to seize the Russian-flagged ship, which is accused of breaking sanctions.

item.title: Families shocked Swiss ski bar was not inspected for years before deadly fire
item.description: The New Year's Eve fire at a bar in Crans-Montana killed 40 people and injured 116.

item.title: Trump says Venezuela will be 'turning over' up to 50 million barrels of oil to US
item.description: Earlier the president said US oil firms could be "up and running" in the country within 18 months.

item.title: Plot to kill Burkina Faso leader foiled, says junta
item.description: The security minister accuses neighbouring Ivory Coast of funding the plan to kill Capt Traoré.
